resources.string: -> This application was made by UC Irvine students for the course CS 125 - Next Gen Search Systems. \n-> This app uses micro-reports generated by users to store into a Firebase database for later queries by users. \n-> Made in Winter 2018

-> Ted Celis: 
—> UC Irvine Senior, Computer Science 
-> Matthew Gintjee: 
—> UC Irvine Senior, Computer Science 
-> Vinson Han: 
—> UC Irvine Senior, Computer Science 
-> Hoang Nguyen: 
—> UC Irvine Senior, Computer Science

-> Accounting for which floor the restroom is on 
-> Update ALL graphics for consistency 
-> Auto-refreshing the map when the user submits a report so that it will show the new restroom 
—> (App refreshes the map after every minute.) So it kinda does this 
-> If the restroom location is in some distance away from another zipcode, add it to that zipcode group.
Press and Hold the pin to drag it to the location

-> V 1.09 (Current): 
—> Has default static filter of 1000 meters for the restrooms. 
——> Planning on letting users modify this filter value.


-> V 1.08: 
—> When submitting a restroom, it will check nearby locations to see if it falls into another zipcode. 
——> If it does then it adds the restroom to that zipcode's table. 
——> This allows for redundant data, but the margin is small enough that it really only covers boundary restrooms. 
—> Does the same for filing complaints.


-> V 1.07: 
—> Moved toast message to be at the top of the screen to avoid cluttering the bottom. 
—> Changed text for filters button to try and make it more clear for the functionality of the buttons. 
—> Changed colors from orange to blue. 
—> Updated some graphics. 
—> Fixed an issue where the app will try to query the DB w/o actually knowing the zipcode.


-> V 1.06: 
—> Added new activity that allows the user to drag and drop the restroom location for increased accuracy. 
—> If the new report has an "N\A", it will use the previous report's feature instead.


-> V 1.05: 
—> Release to Production. 
—> App refreshes the map after every minute. 
——> Unless the user is interacting with it at least once every 30 seconds. 
—> Prevent (starting a report)/(filing a complaint) if the app can't access the user's location. 
—> Toast Activity Gates to help users understand what is happening.


-> V 1.04: (Beta) 
—> Prevented trying to use the database if the database wasn't responsive 
——> Prevents crashes when the DB isn't ready yet 
—> On App resume it reloads the user\s location and the restrooms


-> V 1.03: (Beta) 
—> In theory fixed an issue if the app somehow couldn't get the user's location it crashed. 
—> Finished implementing all the filters. (Amenities and Open or not) 
—> App tells the user how many restrooms it found. 
—> Filters are saved between activities. 
——> NOTE: filters are cleared when the application is closed. 
—> Changed the Radio Groups to be vertical to allow for more space for the text. 
—> Updated graphics to be more consistent.


-> V 1.02: (Beta) 
—> Added feature to restrooms: Last Updated feature.


-> V 1.01: (Beta) 
—> Beta Testing.
